---
title: "Presidential results"
date: "`r targets::tar_read(last_updated)`"
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(targets)

tar_load(c(presidential_table, presidential_map))
invisible(list2env(tar_read(output_functions), .GlobalEnv))

markdown_output <- build_race_output(
  "US President", 
  "presidential_table$tbl_out",
  "presidential_map"
)
```

`r knitr::knit(text = markdown_output)`
